00018 #ifndef _CVSPILS_IMPL_H
00019 #define _CVSPILS_IMPL_H
00020 
00021 #ifdef __cplusplus  /* wrapper to enable C++ usage */
00022 extern "C" {
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 #include <cvode/cvode_spils.h>
00026 
00027 /* Types of iterative linear solvers */
00028 
00029 #define SPILS_SPGMR   1
00030 #define SPILS_SPBCG   2
00031 #define SPILS_SPTFQMR 3
00032 
00033 /*
00034  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00035  * Types : CVSpilsMemRec, CVSpilsMem
00036  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00037  * The type CVSpilsMem is pointer to a CVSpilsMemRec.
00038  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00039  */
00040 
00041 typedef struct {
00042 
00043   int s_type;           /* type of scaled preconditioned iterative LS   */
00044 
00045   int  s_pretype;       /* type of preconditioning                      */
00046   int  s_gstype;        /* type of Gram-Schmidt orthogonalization       */
00047   realtype s_sqrtN;     /* sqrt(N)                                      */
00048   realtype s_delt;      /* delt = user specified or DELT_DEFAULT        */
00049   realtype s_deltar;    /* deltar = delt * tq4                          */
00050   realtype s_delta;     /* delta = deltar * sqrtN                       */
00051   int  s_maxl;          /* maxl = maximum dimension of the Krylov space */
00052 
00053   long int s_nstlpre;   /* value of nst at the last pset call           */
00054   long int s_npe;       /* npe = total number of pset calls             */
00055   long int s_nli;       /* nli = total number of linear iterations      */
00056   long int s_nps;       /* nps = total number of psolve calls           */
00057   long int s_ncfl;      /* ncfl = total number of convergence failures  */
00058   long int s_njtimes;   /* njtimes = total number of calls to jtimes    */
00059   long int s_nfes;      /* nfeSG = total number of calls to f for     
00060                            difference quotient Jacobian-vector products */
00061 
00062   N_Vector s_ytemp;     /* temp vector passed to jtimes and psolve      */
00063   N_Vector s_x;         /* temp vector used by CVSpilsSolve             */
00064   N_Vector s_ycur;      /* CVODE current y vector in Newton Iteration   */
00065   N_Vector s_fcur;      /* fcur = f(tn, ycur)                           */
00066 
00067   CVSpilsPrecSetupFn s_pset; 
00068                         /* pset = user-supplied routine to compute      */
00069                         /* a preconditioner                             */
00070 
00071   CVSpilsPrecSolveFn s_psolve;   
00072                         /* psolve = user-supplied routine to solve      */
00073                         /* preconditioner linear system                 */
00074 
00075   void *s_P_data;       /* P_data passed to psolve and pset             */
00076 
00077   void* s_spils_mem;    /* memory used by the generic solver            */
00078 
00079   CVSpilsJacTimesVecFn s_jtimes;  
00080                         /* jtimes = Jacobian * vector routine           */
00081   void *s_j_data;       /* j_data is passed to jtimes                   */
00082 
00083   int s_last_flag;      /* last error flag returned by any function     */
00084 
00085 } CVSpilsMemRec, *CVSpilsMem;
00086 
00087 /*
00088  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00089  * Prototypes of internal functions
00090  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00091  */
00092 
00093 /* Atimes and PSolve routines called by generic solver */
00094 
00095 int CVSpilsAtimes(void *cv_mem, N_Vector v, N_Vector z);
00096 
00097 int CVSpilsPSolve(void *cv_mem, N_Vector r, N_Vector z, int lr);
00098 
00099 /* Difference quotient approximation for Jac times vector */
00100 
00101 int CVSpilsDQJtimes(N_Vector v, N_Vector Jv, realtype t,
00102                     N_Vector y, N_Vector fy, void *jac_data,
00103                     N_Vector work);
00104 
00105 /*
00106  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00107  * Error Messages
00108  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00109  */
00110 
00111 #define MSGS_CVMEM_NULL  "Integrator memory is NULL."
00112 #define MSGS_MEM_FAIL    "A memory request failed."
00113 #define MSGS_BAD_NVECTOR "A required vector operation is not implemented."
00114 #define MSGS_BAD_LSTYPE  "Incompatible linear solver type."
00115 #define MSGS_BAD_PRETYPE "Illegal value for pretype. Legal values are PREC_NONE, PREC_LEFT, PREC_RIGHT, and PREC_BOTH."
00116 #define MSGS_PSOLVE_REQ  "pretype != PREC_NONE, but PSOLVE = NULL is illegal."
00117 #define MSGS_LMEM_NULL   "Linear solver memory is NULL."
00118 #define MSGS_BAD_GSTYPE  "Illegal value for gstype. Legal values are MODIFIED_GS and CLASSICAL_GS."
00119 #define MSGS_BAD_DELT    "delt < 0 illegal."
00120 
00121 #define MSGS_PSET_FAILED "The preconditioner setup routine failed in an unrecoverable manner."
00122 #define MSGS_PSOLVE_FAILED "The preconditioner solve routine failed in an unrecoverable manner."
00123 #define MSGS_JTIMES_FAILED "The Jacobian x vector routine failed in an unrecoverable manner."
00124 
00125 
00126 #ifdef __cplusplus
00127 }
00128 #endif
